posts.post_title: Raw commons VG-$25    FR/GD-$18-20    (same cards, big price cut)
posts.post_content:
Free shipping on all orders.  

Would really like to move these to free up some money for another purchase.  These all present really well, and I think this price drop makes them a great deal.

Please let me know if you have any questions.  PM is fine, or [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks for looking!

Lavender      25

Hoffman       25
Delehanty    25
Pickering      20
Kroh            20
Wilhelm        18   (SC 649)
Hinchman     25
Clarke          25
Jones          19   (paper-loss by right hand)
Dropped prices on remaining.  Most of these are really nice VG commons.  Priced to sell.  PM or email me if you'd like better (individual) scans or pics.
Hey, got the Hart in the mail and it looks great. Thank you!

PM sent on Waddell. 

Thanks,
Scott
I removed sold cards and the HOFers.  Big price drop, and now I'll ship for free.  Please help me add one of the big ones for my e95/e96 set!
Waddell arrived in the mail today. Thanks again Luke!
